FROM code a join codeGroup b on a.codeGroup_ccgSeq = b.ccgSeq WHERE 1=1 AND ccDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND codeGroup_ccgSeq = #{shValue} AND b.ccgName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ccSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ccName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ccNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.* ,b.ccgSeq ,b.ccgName
ORDER BY a.ccSeq DESC
SELECT a.* FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND ccSeq = #{ccSeq}
SELECT a.* FROM codeGroup a WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET ccDelNy = 1 WHERE ccSeq = #{ccSeq}
